metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7859 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 23.0.0.205 and earlier, 11.2.202.643 and earlier have an exploitable use-after-free vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7859` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.644ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.644ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.644ubuntu0.14.04.1').
